Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 13 lines text on recto and verso containing a request.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1903 on behalf of EEF)
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Monastery of St Phoibammon, Location of Temple of Mentuhotep I.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (100-108, pl.6)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (391726) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/391726)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 5 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
